participant_1.background:
My smart watch helps me stay on track with my busy schedule.
i like cooking healthy meals.
i am currently working on a project that involves bitcoins.
I relax by spending time with my pets.
i am the general manager of the local grocery store.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy going to the movies with my friends because we can relax and have fun together.
once a year , i take a week off and head to florida.
i have a cat named george.
my favorite place to spend time at is the beach.
I have a good relationship with my parents, although we don't always agree on everything.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing?
Hey, I am doing great! How are you today?
I am doing well thank you!
Awesome to hear! What are your hobbies?
I like to cook healthy meals and I love spending time with my pets.
That is great! I love to go to the movies with my friends, but I also enjoy spending time at the beach and with my cat, George.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have a cat too, his name is Oliver.
Aww, what a cute name! I love cats!
Me too! They are such sweet animals.
I agree! I am glad we have something in common.
Me too! I also enjoy going to the movies with my friends. We usually go to the movies once a week.
That is awesome! I wish I had time to go to the movies more often.
It is a lot of fun! We usually go to see the latest action movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love action movies too.
We should go to the movies together sometime!
That would be great! I would love to go to the movies with you.
Awesome! I will let you know when I am free.
Sounds good! I look forward to hearing from you
